meanings.definition: Not relating to space or physical dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The nonspatial concept of time is difficult to grasp.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a nonspatial painting that seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent3: In the nonspatial world of dreams, anything is possible.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drifted into a nonspatial realm where logic had no place.
meanings.sent5: The nonspatial music filled the room with a sense of tranquility.

meanings.sent1: The nonspatial puzzle required logical thinking rather than visual skills.
meanings.sent2: The nonspatial design of the room made it feel cozy yet open.
meanings.sent3: His nonspatial sense of direction often led to comical detours.
meanings.sent4: The nonspatial atmosphere of the library was conducive to deep thinking.
meanings.sent5: The nonspatial aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
